name: Deadname
description:
A lovesick witch brings her boyfriend back from the dead, only to discover her "boyfriend" isn't the person either of them thought she was.

This originally started out as a story for Light Novelmber 2018, and fortunately I managed it to finish it in... 12 months oh jeez. Still, I finally feel this is the best I can make it, and I figured it would work well to publish a story like this on Halloween. 

I do hope you enjoy it, and look forward to my next piece, hopefully in less than a year from now.
